entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
